idea-plugin.name: Unicodifier
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin allows to encode/decode unicode.


You can either:
  1. unicode all non-latin characters in selected text with "Unicodify" option
  2. unicode all characters in selected text with "Unicodify all" option
  3. or decode all unicode characters in selected text with "Decodify"


    4. Use right click for the "Unicodify" option to appear in menu or use shortcut "Ctrl + Alt + U" Similarly for "Decodify" or use shortcut "Ctrl + Alt + D"
